content.query:
-- Shows delegation size for each nation.
-- Larger delegations may indicate strong sports infrastructure.
SELECT
    Country,
    COUNT(*) AS AthleteCount
FROM athletes
GROUP BY Country
ORDER BY AthleteCount DESC;

-- Coaching depth is a key predictor of future performance.
SELECT
    Country,
    COUNT(*) AS CoachCount
FROM coaches
GROUP BY Country
ORDER BY CoachCount DESC;

-- Evaluates whether countries are coaching athletes effectively.
-- High ratio = too few coaches supporting too many athletes.
WITH A AS (
    SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS Athletes FROM athletes GROUP BY Country
),
C AS (
    SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS Coaches FROM coaches GROUP BY Country
)
SELECT
    A.Country,
    A.Athletes,
    C.Coaches,
    ROUND(A.Athletes * 1.0 / NULLIF(C.Coaches, 0), 1) AS AthletesPerCoach
FROM A
LEFT JOIN C ON A.Country = C.Country
ORDER BY AthletesPerCoach DESC;
